content: --पुरं {1} a collection of three cities. {2} the three cities of gold, silver, and iron in the sky, air and earth built for demons by Maya; (these cities were burnt down, along with the demons inhabiting them, by Śiva at the request of the gods); <ls>Ku. 7. 48</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 2</ls>; <ls>Me. 56</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 123</ls>; (--रः <ab>N.</ab> of a demon or demons presiding over these cities. (--री {1} <ab>N.</ab> of a place near Jabbalpura, formerly capital of the kings of Cedi. {2} <ab>N.</ab> of a country.
